contentrichtext.text: '''David Hughes''' may refer to: {{tocright}} ==Entertainment== *[[David Hughes (bass player)]] (born 1971), Swedish bass guitarist *[[David Hughes (tenor)]] (1929–1972), English popular singer, later an opera singer *[[David Hughes (musician)]] (born 1960), English musician and composer *[[Dave Hughes]] (born 1970), Australian stand-up comedian ==Sports== *[[David Hughes (American football)]] (born 1959), former fullback for the Seattle Seahawks *[[David Hughes (cricketer)]] (born 1947), Lancashire, Tasmania and MCC cricketer *[[David Hughes (cricketer, born 1978)]] (born 1978), Hertfordshire cricketer *[[David Hughes (hockey player, born 1958)]] (born 1958), Welsh Masters hockey player *[[David Hughes (Somerset cricketer)]] (born 1934), Somerset cricketer *[[David Hughes (footballer born 1943)]], footballer for Tranmere Rovers *[[David Hughes (footballer born 1958)]], English footballer for Aston Villa, Lincoln City and Scunthorpe United *[[David Hughes (footballer born 1972)]], English/Welsh footballer formerly with Southampton *[[David Hughes (footballer born 1978)]], Welsh footballer formerly with Aston Villa *[[David Hughes (athlete)]], English athlete (400m hurdles) *[[David Hughes (hurler)]] (born 1967), Irish retired hurler ==Other persons== *[[David Hughes (Amtrak)]], interim president and CEO of Amtrak, 2005–2006 *[[David Hughes (astronomer)]], English astronomer specialising in comets *[[David Hughes (cleric)]] (1785–1850), Welsh Anglican priest *[[David Hughes (college principal)]] (1753/4–1817), Principal of Jesus College, Oxford *[[David Hughes (illustrator)]] (born 1952?), English artist and illustrator *[[David Hughes (novelist)]] (1930–2005), British novelist *[[David Edward Hughes]] (1831–1900), British-born inventor and American academic *[[David Hughes (aviator)]] (born 1899), World War I flying ace *[[David Pierce Hughes]] (born 1947), British author, poet, inventor, film maker and artist ==See also== *[[4205 David Hughes]], an asteroid *[[Ysgol David Hughes]], a school in Wales named after a local philanthropist {{hndis|Hughes, David}}
